biotools.summary: Scans a human genomic region for genes related to an inherited disease. The server also presents precomputed candidate genes for more than 600 genetically inherited diseases that have been mapped onto chromosomal regions without assignment of a particular gene.

bioschemas.name: G2D
bioschemas.summary: Scans a human genomic region for genes related to an inherited disease. The server also presents precomputed candidate genes for more than 600 genetically inherited diseases that have been mapped onto chromosomal regions without assignment of a particular gene.
